title: Add back "Unskilled player" as a report option to league of legends
body: it was good to report the people who were trolling so please add it back

replies.body:
You're contradicting yourself.

While the two aren't mutually exclusive, an unskilled player is not the same as a troll.

Riot admitted "unskilled player" did nothing to people except very slightly reduce the chance for that player to show up in your NORMAL games.

It served no purpose except to let salty people have something to click in the post-game lobby.

> [{quoted}](name=BarryButcher,realm=OCE,application-id=T8eq2lFQ,discussion-id=KQTExBr9,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2018-02-04T00:45:07.588+0000)
>
> Riot admitted "unskilled player" did nothing to people except very slightly reduce the chance for that player to show up in your NORMAL games.
> 
> It served no purpose except to let salty people have something to click in the post-game lobby.

why not just make the button but have it do nothing?
People are already complaining about Riot lying to them and doing nothing about reports and you want to add fuel to that fire?

I mean there's a difference between knowing the button does nothing, and riot not actively using reports given to them.

If it allows a player to vent, whether you know it does nothing or not, it helps.

You think most people look that far into it? Having a button in the same place as actually punishable offences is misleading, and if you label the button saying "this does nothing" then it's meaningless and doesn't work as a vent button. So one way is worse than nothing at all and the other is entirely pointless.

Ever heard of writing a letter and ripping it up?

Yeah that never gets sent, but it can help quite a lot actually.

Well, physically writing a letter (whether hand-written or typed) and ripping it up is a lot different than clicking a mouse a few times.

Just saying.

I mean, who says that it's different?

While it may be different for you, not everything is about you.

Believe it or not but for a fair amount of players, this would actually help, i am actually one of those players.

Though generally now it just goes under intent feeding whether that is accurate or not because Riot removed the feature.

Hell give it that little grey text, that actively says "this doesn't do anything, this is for venting"

> I mean, who says that it's different?

Seems like you've misinterpreted my statement.

The act of writing a letter and ripping it up is *fundamentally* different from clicking a mouse a few times. That is not an opinion, it is a **fact**.

I *never* said (or attempted to imply/infer) that it wouldn't work in much the same way for *certain* individuals, but to imply that they will both act in the same way based on *your* experience/personality would seem to suggest you are making this about *you*.

But of course, that's not important, *is it*? The only important thing here is that I'm the one who is making everything about me, *isn't it*? Because, you know, that just what "Rito white knights" do, *isn't it*?
Yep let's turn this into an attack instead of staying on point.
I mean, no more than you did. The only thing that could even kind of be called an '*attack*' is "would seem to suggest you are making this about you". Which you also basically said in your comment...

I'm simply saying that for some people tearing up letters isn't fundamentally different, and he is calling it fact and then attacking me.

It's the same as the argument over lootboxes being predatory, for some people it's hard not to buy lootboxes and be consumed by the predatory tactics, for some it isn't.

But hey no i must be wrong and it must be fact that they are different.

It's not like this topic was probably made by someone who actually want's this report option for venting purposes.

And hell, me saying "While it may be different for you, not everything is about you." this is me actually trying to say, that people are fundamentally different, whereas his was clearly just postured for an attack.

I believe his argument was that pressing a button is fundamentally different psychologically speaking than actually putting thought into a letter as a vent with no intention of sending it. 

As I read it he never said that the act of pressing a button couldn't have the same end effect for some players, simply that it's a fundamentally different action (one involves putting thoughts and feeling to a medium, the other is just an angry button press). You're the one that started the whole "stop making this about you".

The OP didn't want the option to vent if that's what you meant, he wants it to report trolls, which is a misunderstanding of what the report option was ever for. This conversation started from Essembie's comment and so far as I can tell he just saw no reason not to have it more than actually wanting it himself.

I think he's just understandably salty that you make it incredibly frustrating to have conflicting views with you.

*shrug* if you have issues having conflicting views with me, not much i can do about that.

Fact is reporting people helps some people vent, even when people know for a fact that that person isn't doing something wrong, having a way to report them helps.

Again, now it just forces me to have a lot of reports for inting that shouldn't be there (though, the ones that should be there don't get banned, but that's a whole different kettle of fish.)
